articles.title: Allu Arjun’s Voice Is in Controversy! - M9
articles.description: Shreyas Talpade, known for dubbing Allu Arjun's character in the Hindi version of Pushpa, recently discussed his experience of suffering a heart attack last year in connection with the COVID-19 vaccine.
